Ice::

She nodded."I agree. Itwould be best if we departed before they start 
to ask questions. Let's get out of here." 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lunarpine woke up from a nap in a storage area near the recovery 
room. he
> stood up and stretched his creaking mechanical limbs. He opened his 
mind to
> return his thoughts to her. "I'm alright Wing that monstrosity 
didn't do
> anything to me that a little time in beast mode didn't handle." He 
still had
> a crick in his back, probably from landing wrong when Megaton had 
hit him.
> "How about we try to slip out of here before the Maximals start 
asking
> questions we don't want to answer?" He thought feeling ill at ease 
about the
> facts Megaton had blurted out about Veratis. Lunarpine owed him a 
dept that
> he wasn't wanting to explain to anyone, he fealt in his spark that 
it was
> his best option, it was his ONLY option.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <logomorph@h...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Tuesday, March 27, 2001 11:24 PM
> Subject: Ice
> 
> 
> > Ice::
> > She woke up in the CR tank and the images she had been projecting
> > stopped.  She opened the door and stepped out.  Something didn't 
make
> > sence to her. If she just got out of the CR unit, then why'd she 
feel
> > so tired.  She looked around and transformed into griffin mode.
> > Standing on all fours, she stretched her wings. Her shoulder felt
> > great, her wounds were nicely healed, but she had a few new scars 
to
> > proudly wear.  She opened up her mind to Lunarpine. "How are you
> > feeling? Have you had your turn in the CR yet?" Then she 
remembered
> > his remark about her wieght. She smirked and chuckled to herself.
> > She thought to herself, I'll get him for that one, he'll never 
see it
> > coming.
> >
> > Despite it all, she cared for Lunarpine with all her spark. If she
> > let anything happen to him, she'd rip her spark out and give it to
> > Veratis on an energon platter.  It was her love for him that kept 
her
> > alive while her spark sat in a jar in Veratis' lab. And she wasn't
> > going to give him up now.
